messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] tampa
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Annette, I am on another unschooling list very casual and I know there are a couple of people from Florida on it this might be  a start anyway it s
messages.messageBody:
Hi Annette, I am on another unschooling list very casual and I know there
are a couple of people from Florida on it this might be a start anyway
it's usonline@egroups.com I believe that is the right way to get to it!
Tanya


>
>
>Hi,
>
>Does anyone know of an unschooling group in Tampa, Fla.? A very good friend
>of mine (with one 7-yo son) just moved there and I think she would love to
>meet some like-minded families. You can email me off list if you like.
>
>Annette
>
